segments.text: We are interested in some precision machine tools . We have some inquires on hand .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's fine . We can supply all kinds of precision machine tools . Our products are much admired in the world market and enjoy a wide acceptance in modern industry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I have a look at your catalogue and the corresponding technical data ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why , of course . Here are some that will show you our latest development . You may select which ever you need .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think our users have the impression that your prices are always much too high , compared with those of other supplies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excuse me . It's true that our products do cost slightly more than the other makers , but It's only due to our technological superiority .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your products may have certain advantages , but your prices are too stiff .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you give us your inquiry , I shall go very carefully into the price and try my best to put you on the best of the terms .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I'll come back to discuss it to some details after our users have studied your catalogues and price list .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , surely . We hope to do some substantial business with you .
segments.speaker: S2
